nodes.text: The J0-1Y was a type of Podracer-like repulsorcraft manufactured by Vectron during the Galactic War.

The Vectron J0-1Y first appeared in Star Wars: The Old Republic as part of the 2014 Life Day celebration; it is available for purchase in the Cartel Market, and is a spoof of Santa's sleigh similar to the 2013 vehicle Sleigh I.
